mapper.update: update teaching_class_t set ELC_NUMBER_ = ELC_NUMBER_ + 1 where id_ = #{teachingClassId} and NUMBER_ > ELC_NUMBER_
update teaching_class_t set ELC_NUMBER_ = ELC_NUMBER_ + 1 where id_ = #{teachingClassId}
update teaching_class_t set ELC_NUMBER_ = ELC_NUMBER_ - 1 where id_ = #{teachingClassId} and ELC_NUMBER_ > 0
mapper.select: select * from teaching_class_t where id_ = #{teachingClassId} and ELC_NUMBER_ > NUMBER_
select GRADE_ as grade,PROFESSION_ as profession,NUMBER_ as number from teaching_class_suggest_profession_t where TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = #{teachingClassId}
select STUDENT_ID_ from teaching_class_suggest_student_t where TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = #{teachingClassId}

SELECT cour.id_ as courseId, cour.code_ as courseCode, open.COURSE_NAME_ as courseName from course_t cour join course_open_t open ON open.COURSE_CODE_ = cour.code_ join teaching_task_t task ON task.COURSE_OPEN_ID_ = open.id_ join teaching_class_t class ON task.id_ = class.TASK_ID_ where( select TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ from teaching_class_suggest_student_t where STUDENT_ID_ = #{stu.studentId} UNION select TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ from teaching_class_suggest_profession_t where GRADE_ = #{stu.grade} and PROFESSION_ = #{stu.major} ) GROUP BY cour.id_, cour.code_, open.COURSE_NAME_

select ti.ID_ arrangeTimeId,ti.DAY_OF_WEEK_ dayOfWeek,ti.TIME_START_ timeStart,ti.TIME_END_ timeEnd,ro.WEEK_NUMBER_ weekNumber from teaching_class_t t2 join teaching_class_arrange_time_t ti on t2.ID_ = ti.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ join teaching_class_arrange_room_t ro on ti.ID_=ro.ARRANGE_TIME_ID_ where t2.ID_=#{teachingClassId}

#{id}
